response.job_title: Customer Service Supervisor at SPX FLOW, Inc.
response.summary: Bilingual Mechanical Engineer with knowledge and experience in the areas of refrigeration installations, ventilation, air conditioning, plastic manufacturing process, technical sales for the food & beverage industry.  Highly technical engineering background in software management for manufacturing, design, simulation applications. Quick learning skills and ease to establish effective work links oriented to achievements and results.
response.skills: Operations Management, Analytical Skills, Communication, Sales, Customer Relationship Management (CRM), Microsoft Office, SolidWorks, AutoCAD, Autodesk Inventor, Solid Edge

profile_positions.description: Leads, directs, and manages a staff of Customer Service Representatives based in the LATAM market ensuring that customers are retained, satisfied, and that their needs are fulfilled. Responsible for designing and implementing improved process or operational processes. This position also assists in the management of day to day activities of the Customer Service department in processing orders, changing orders, product returns, credits, and all related questions regarding these activities. Also includes handling pricing and price list questions regarding standard products and providing support on engineered product lines.
profile_positions.title: Customer Service Supervisor

profile_positions.description: Customer requests over telephone, written, or web chat regarding product selection, placement of orders, quotations, and complaints to include returns/credits, shortages and adjustments, order status and expedites, and requests for documentation. Direct liaison with customers, internal sales personnel, and distribution.
profile_positions.title: Customer Service Specialist

profile_positions.description: Support, technical and commercial support, accompaniment in visits and in-depth monitoring for distributors in our region with coverage in Colombia, Venezuela, Ecuador and Panama and the Caribbean Islands, proposing attractive strategies for sales increase of equipment and spare parts of our APV-WCB brands. Fast and effective response for requests and concerns of the sales force belonging to the distributor, monthly pipeline analysis and quarterly results of each in concern to its annual forecast. Purchasing and logistic support for sales and engineering.
profile_positions.title: Sales Engineer

profile_positions.description: Design and development of new and existing plastic parts for the automotive industry, portable sanitation, agroindustry, various applications through thermoforming and heat pressed manufacturing. Feasibility study for the development of the new products and process follow-up during design and production to achieve quality criteria following the APQP (Advanced Product Quality Planning), PPAP (Production Part Approval Process) and client's requirements.
profile_positions.title: Product Innovation Engineer

profile_positions.description: Technical evaluation of project designs to assess strategies focused on achieving sustainability and energy efficiency goals. Site visits coordination to evaluate the installation of air conditioning, lighting, electrical and hydro-sanitary systems according to client's requirements. English documentation for Commissioning process in order to comply with the LEED certification in sustainable construction.
profile_positions.title: Commissioning Project Analyst

profile_positions.description: Bilingual agent in charge of customer service and technical support for AT&T clients .
profile_positions.title: Customer Service Representative

education.degree_name: Visitor Scholar in the HVAC Research Group

company.name: SPX FLOW, Inc.
company.description:
SPX FLOW solves processing challenges, helping customers lower costs, increase uptime, save energy, reduce waste, and improve quality.

We manufacture and deliver high-value technology, service and support to leading nutrition, health, and industrial businesses around the world. From dairy processors and mixers to our state-of-the-art Innovation Centers, we collaborate with customers to develop and perfect their critical manufacturing processes. Our inventive pumps, values and systems make it easy to provide end-users with high quality products while cutting production costs. We support you, as you support them.  

With operations in more than 25 countries, we meet the varying needs of our diverse customer base to make life safer, healthier, and more sustainable. To learn more, please visit spxflow.com
